ModMetaData.name: Area Inclusion & Exclusion
ModMetaData.author: talakhallen
ModMetaData.description:
This mod make you can choose multiple allowed area and exclude some areas.
- Usage Left click : include area, same as vanila's but you can include multiple areas. Right click : exclude area. all exclusion calculated after inclusions. Any click on already included/excluded area : remove area selection.
Forked from https://github.com/gguake/RWMod-AreaInclusionExclusion.
Source code available at https://github.com/talakhallen/RWMod-AreaInclusionExclusion.
